caption: Observed Entity
description: The entity which is best described by the event.
name: observed_entity

api.description: Describes details about the API call associated with the current event.

container.description: Describes details about the container associated with the current event.

device.description: An addressable device, computer system or host associated with the current event.

web_resources.description: Information about the web-based resource associated with the the current event. This may include the resource's URL, path, content type, or service endpoint.
